title: Design Process for Refutation Text-Based Math Videos to Facilitate Conceptual Change

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concept Comprehension and Adaptability to Online Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Online Video-Based Course Targeting Correction of Misconceptions in Mathematical Concepts. Supports Self-Directed Learning for Students/Job Seekers

learning_goals: Learners can identify and correct at least three types of mathematical misconceptions through countertext-based videos
Learners can explain differences in conceptual understanding (over 15% variation) based on the presence or absence of human hand visual elements in videos
Learners achieve over 80% correction of misconceptions through formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
